text:
July 2, 1956
Mr, John H. Lerch
Psy. Warfare Det. 8239
APO 500
c/o Postmaster
San Francisco, California
Dear Mr. Lerchs
I have received your letter of June 22 and the enclosed script for program # 7.
The tape for that program has arrived, also.
Glad to hear all is going well over there. I thought the change in theme music
was for the better and does improve the show.
You have my good wishes in your attempt to sell REPORT FROM JAPAN to the Japan
Society. Good luck in the deal.1
Cordially,
Robert E. Underwood, Jr.
Network Manager
REUjdfc
